archimate:Requirement.name: SD.2.5.2c: c) types of testing to be employed (e.g. end-to-end and performance testing; use under normal and exceptional business conditions; error situations; and the effectiveness of security controls)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
